column1: Maidarzhavyn Ganzorig (Mongolian: ??????????? ????????, Maidarjavyn Ganzorig; born February 5, 1949 in Tsetserleg, Mongolia) is a Mongolian scientist.
In 1978, he participated in the Soviet Intercosmos program and trained for a Soyuz space flight.
Ganzorig graduated from the Kiev Polytechnic Institute in 1975.
In 1978, he was selected as the backup to Jgderdemidiin Grragchaa for the Soyuz 39 mission.
In 1984, he received a Candidate of Technical Sciences degree.
